documents.document:
BABY SHOWER

FOR THOSE OF YOU THAT DO KNOW ME,. I AM ALWAYS LATE ON GETTING THINGS OUT!!!!

SO WITH THAT SAID, I AM HAVING A BABY SHOWER HERE AT MY HOUSE FOR MY

DAUGHTER, ON OCT, 11TH FROM 1PM TO 3PM, PLEASE COME IF YOU CAN, EVEN JUST TO

HAVE FUN AND HANG OUT...

JUST TODAY!

MY DAY STARTED OUT GREAT!! SURE WISH IT STARTED LIKE THAT, EVERY MORNING?
WORK WENT PRETTY GOOD. ALL KIDS WERE GOOD, TO A POINT. I WENT TO THE RIFFLE RANGE, TOOK TWO SHOTS AND RANG THE BELL TWICE AT 200 YARDS, SO MY GUN IS GOOD TO GO... HOPE MY PHONE CALL COMES IN SOON, CAN'T WAIT. HAVE A GREAT NIGHT.

Once Again

I was up at 2:15am. Just waiting! And I will wait some more, someday my sleep will come!
I will not let this get me tired, so much to do, and no phone call!
Life really throws you a curve when you think, everyone is giving up on you.
You can't live for anyone else, but yourself, I have tried that, it just breaks your heart!
With that said, I shall try to live life, knowing that no one will be around to pick the peices up if I fall apart!! SO THE OBJECT IS NOT TO FALL!!! That is so hard,... I will just leave it at that..

Today,

WHAT A DAY, AND IT IS ONLY 1:30PM, I GOT UP KINDA LATE, BUT MADE IT TO MY APPOINTMENT... HAD MY MESSAGE, HAD A GREAT TIME TALKING TO HER, SHE'S HOT.

ANYWAYS, I HAVE SO MUCH STUFF TO DO HERE AT HOME, GETTING READY FOR MY KIDS BABY SHOWER. I AM LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS.....
TALKED WITH LYNNE TODAY, JUST WISH WE CAN MEET ON A REGULAR TIME... IT IS HARD.

WELL I AM NOT GETTING ANY WORK DONE BY SITTING HERE. JUST WAS HOPING THAT I WAS ABLE TO TALK TO SOMEONE... HE IS NOT ON. HAVE A GREAT DAY. LOVE YOU ALL.

Baby shower

What a day, it went better then I thought it would.. Though my sister did not call. thats ok.
Last person left about 7pm. My daughter was out by 6pm. she was beat.
I HAVE 4 MORE HOURS, AND I SHOULD GET SOME KINDA OF RELEASE... CAN'T WAIT.

Hunting

It was a great weekend. I went to Skate Creek, looking for deer. Found a bear, but went the other way... I do love to walk in the woods. Going to Mud Creek rd, next weekend. hopfully I get one there... I possted my pics on myspace, if you would like to look. llama 091305/myspace.com

LOVE

WHAT CAN I SAY? MY LIFE HAS BEEN LIKE A ROLLER COASTER. I CAN SEE MANY, BUT ONLY WANT ONE! IT'S THAT ONE, THAT GETS ME GOING!
I HAVE TO WATCH MYSELF, I CAN'T GO OVER BOARD, EVEN THOUG I WANT TO SO BAD!
SO FOR NOW, I WILL ENJOY MY TIME, AND PRAY THAT IT NEVER ENDS.. WITH ALL MY LOVE!

AN AWESOMEDAY!

OH MY, I DON'T KNOW HOW TO EXPLAIN IT. AM I JUST HAVING LUST OR IS IT FOR REAL? THE WAY I FEEL, IS OUT OF THIS WORLD!! : I WOULD LOVE TO GO ON, BUT I KNOW I CAN'T.... WISH I HAD SOMEONE TO TELL ALL MY FEELINGS ABOUT THIS 2. SO FOR NOW I WILL WRITE. NEXT WEEK IS A HOLIDAY, I AM GOING TO MISS MY FRIEND SO BADLY.... UNTILL NEXT TIME. WITH ALL MY LOVE, AND I DO LOVE YOU FOR AS MUCH AS I CAN OR YOU WILL LET ME....

WHAT'S A BODY TO DO?

WOW, WHAT A MORNING! I DON'T THINK I HAVE FELT ANYTHING LIKE THAT IN, I HAVE NO IDEA. BUT IT WAS GREAT. MADE MY BODY MELT SO MUCH. I LOVED IT. CAN'T WAIT TO DO IT AGAIN. I WANT TO FEEL THE TINGLEING ALL OVER MY BODY AGAIN! GUESS I WILL STOP HERE, MY FEELINGS ARE RUNNING STRONG.....

Jan 20th 2010

WOW, WHAT A NIGHT!!! YES I HAVE A BF, IT IS GREAT!! HE TOLD ME TONIGHT THAT HE LOVES ME, AND HASN'T STOPPED...I SO DO LOVE HIM!!!

THE LOVE OF MY LIFE!!

Looking back at the past 14 months, who would think that we would end up like this?
Well, I was hoping and wishing that we would. I waited long enough for him. AND THE WAIT WAS WORTH IT!!! What has happened in the past year, is the past. All I Want is for us to be HAPPY!! I look forward to his phone calls, and text massages. But most of all, I look forward to him holding me, making me MELT.... he does it so well.. Could it be, cause I LOVE HIM SO MUCH... We have our own instant Family, I love him even more, cause he loves my daughter like his own... and even though I have not met his son, I do love him also.
Someday we all will be together, I do hope so. I will stop for now. My LOVE FOR YOU IS RUNNING SO DEEP INSIDE ME, I WANT THE WORLD TO KNOW WHO I LOVE, BUT FOR NOW, IT WILL HAVE TO BE KEPT TO OURSELFS.
